mapper.select: /* com.neofect.gts.services.ho.repository.HO03020Repository.getCenterList */ SELECT A.DEPT_ID, A.DEPT_NAME, A.OPER_DIV, A.SERVICE_CODE, A.USE_YN, A.ZIP_CODE, A.ADDR1, A.ADDR2, A.PHONE, A.FAX, A.OWNER_NAME, A.OWNER_HP, A.MANAGER_NAME, A.MANAGER_HP, A.BIZ_NO, A.BIZ_NAME, A.BIZ_UPTAE, A.BIZ_UPJONG, A.BIZ_ADDR1, A.BIZ_ADDR2, A.RENT_BAMT, A.REMT_MAMT, A.OPER_AMT, A.PROXY_DEPTID, B.DEPT_NAME AS PROXY_DEPTNAME, A.SALECENTER_YN, A.UPPER_DEPTID, C.DEPT_NAME AS UPPER_DEPTNAME, A.SALECENTER_MAIN, A.CHARGE_MAN, A.CHARGE_TEL, A.CHARGE_FAX, A.PAY_CALC_DIV FROM CODE_DEPT A LEFT JOIN CODE_DEPT B ON B.DEPT_ID = A.PROXY_DEPTID LEFT JOIN CODE_DEPT C ON C.DEPT_ID = A.UPPER_DEPTID WHERE A.DEPT_ID LIKE #{dept} AND A.USE_YN LIKE #{use} ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID

/* com.neofect.gts.services.ho.repository.HO03020Repository.HO03020C03 */ SELECT A.DEPT_ID, A.DEPOSITNO, A.BANK_DIV, A.BRANCH_NAME, A.DEPOSIT_DIV, A.CARD_CHARGERATE, A.FIRST_RAMT, A.NOW_RAMT FROM CODE_DEPOSITNO A WHERE A.DEPT_ID LIKE #{dept} ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID, A.DEPOSIT_DIV, A.DEPOSITNO

/* com.neofect.gts.services.ho.repository.HO03020Repository.HO03020C04 */ SELECT B.DEPT_ID AS EMP_DEPT_ID, C.DEPT_NAME, A.MEMBER_ID, B.NAME, A.DEPT_ID, A.PRINT_SEQ FROM CODE_DEPT_AUTHORITY A INNER JOIN CODE_MEMBER B ON B.MEMBER_ID = A.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN CODE_DEPT C ON C.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE A.DEPT_ID = #{dept} ORDER BY B.DEPT_ID, B.NAME
